mapper.select: select e.event_id, u.user_name, e.title, e.content, e.start_date, e.end_date, e.status_code, e.reg_dt from EVENT e, USERS u where e.user_seq = u.user_seq and e.event_id = #{eventId}
select e.event_id, e.title, e.content, e.start_date, e.end_date, e.status_code from EVENT e, USERS u where e.user_seq = u.user_seq order by e.event_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

select e.event_id, e.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image_url, e.title, e.content, e.reg_dt from EVENT e, USERS u where e.user_seq = u.user_seq and e.title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') order by e.event_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from EVENT e where e.title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
